elements.text: You're at a busy restaurant chatting with friends. PD has made your speech quieter, and you are worried that your friends will have difficulty hearing you over the background noise. One friend asks you to repeat yourself multiple times, and you can see that they look...

elements.name: Dine with Friends_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
